text: Sochaux is a commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Doubs department in east France, near Montbéliard. == Economy == Sochaux is the site of a large industrial facility of the French car manufacturer PSA Peugeot Citroën. As of late 2005, about 16,000 people are employed there. The Peugeot automobile museum is located here. == Sport == The FC Sochaux-Montbéliard football club is in the commune. == References == == Other websites == * Official website * The Peugeot Museum at Sochaux Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Sochaux
